page.title: 15Recent Events in Clun
page.content: The Flower Festival was held in the parish church from 13-15th July,1984. The theme was, " Following in the steps of the Lord." There was a Festival Service in the church on the Sunday morning. In the evening the Hereford Madrigal Society gave a concert. The Festival raised Â£3,000 for church funds. Clun Road Show took place on the Old Castle Grounds. It was a pilot programme for a possible series based on country life. BBC cameras came to film the village show which they had arranged. The programme was broadcast on BBC television. The church bells came back in October 1981. They had gone to the bell foundry in Loughborough to have new headstocks, clappers & bearings fitted. BBC regional news filmed their return to Clun. There was a procession through the streets.
